column1: #Text=" Sokka says : " We 're in serious trouble .
#Text=" Bumi says : " Tomorrow , the Avatar will face three deadly challenges .
#Text=But for now , the guards will show you to your chamber .
#Text=" Chamberlain says : " My liege , do you mean the good chamber or the bad chamber ?
#Text=" Bumi says : " The newly refurbished chamber .
#Text=" Chamberlain says : " Wait , which one are we talking about ?
#Text=" Bumi says : " The one that used to be the bad chamber , until the recent refurbishing , that is .
#Text=Of course , we 've been calling it the new chamber , but we really should number them .
#Text=Uh , take them to the refurbished chamber that was once bad !
